title: Leaking Roof
description: Water leaking through ceiling in computer lab during rain
recommended_action: Temporary containment and schedule roof inspection

title: Damaged Scaffolding
description: Scaffold on east wing construction has loose connections
recommended_action: Replace damaged components before allowing access

title: Asbestos Suspected
description: During renovation, workers found suspicious material that may contain asbestos
recommended_action: Cease work, isolate area, arrange testing

title: Slippery Floor
description: Recently waxed floor without warning signs
recommended_action: Place warning signs and use anti-slip treatments

title: Blocked Fire Exit
recommended_action: Immediately clear pathway to comply with fire code

title: Missing Machine Guard
description: Table saw in workshop missing safety guard
recommended_action: Install proper guard before equipment use is permitted

title: Improper Chemical Storage
description: Incompatible chemicals stored together in lab cabinet
recommended_action: Separate chemicals according to compatibility chart

title: Extension Cord Hazard
description: Multiple extension cords daisy-chained across walkway
recommended_action: Install proper outlets and remove trip hazard

title: Unstable Excavation
description: Construction trench showing signs of instability with no shoring
recommended_action: Install proper shoring immediately and restrict access

title: Exposed Electrical Wiring
description: Multiple exposed wires found in the main hallway ceiling
recommended_action: Immediate isolation and repair by licensed electrician
